tiled.description: type=image Tiles the image. Can be a boolean or a string with possible values being x and y (which orientation it tiles)

tiled_scale.description: type=image Sets the scale of the tiles (if tiled property is true)

bilinear.description: type=image Applies bilinear filtering to the image

grayscale.description: type=image Makes image black and white

clip_direction.description: type=image When `#clip_ratio` is used, tells in which direction will clip go (`down` will tell to clip from the top to the bottom)

nineslice_size.description: type=image `[x, y]` or `[x1, y1, x2, y2]`

force_texture_reload.description: type=image Reload image when the texture path is changed

grid_dimensions.description: type=grid Number of rows and columns in form of `[x_size, y_size]`

maximum_grid_items.description: type=grid Numbers of items the grid has. An alternative to `grid_dimensions`

grid_item_template.description: type=grid An element capable of handling collections

grid_dimension_binding.description: type=grid Binding name for grid dimensions

color.description: type=label,image Text color, an array of R,G,B with values from 0.0 to 1.0 (e.g. `[0.0, 0.6, 1.0]`)

locked_color.description: type=label Same as `color`. It will be applied instead of `color` if the parent element is locked

line_padding.description: type=label Space in pixels between lines

font_scale_factor.description: type=label It scales the size of the text. It’s better to use this rather than `font_size`

shadow.description: type=label Adds a shadow to text

localize.description: type=label Translate the text using the *_*.lang files

enable_profanity_filter.description: type=label Filters bad words included on the `profanity_filter.wlist` file

hide_hyphen.description: type=label Hide all hyphens in the text

notify_on_ellipses.description: type=label Name of the objects it will receive #using_ellipses when the text has `…`

default_control.description: type=button,slider,edit_box Name of the child that will be displayed only in default state.

hover_control.description: type=button,slider,edit_box Name of the child that will be displayed only in hover state.

pressed_control.description: type=button,edit_box Name of the child that will be displayed only in pressed state.

locked_control.description: type=button,edit_box Name of the child that will be displayed only in locked state.

sound_name.description: type=button,toggle Name of the sound defined in the `sounds/sound_definitions.json` file that plays when the button is clicked

toggle_group_default_selected.description: type=toggle Index of the default toggle of the its group

toggle_grid_collection_name.description: type=toggle Name of the collection the toggle belongs to

checked_control.description: type=toggle Name of the child that will be displayed only in checked state

unchecked_control.description: type=toggle Name of the child that will be displayed only in unchecked state

checked_hover_control.description: type=toggle Name of the child that will be displayed only in checked and hovered state

unchecked_hover_control.description: type=toggle Name of the child that will be displayed only in unchecked and hovered state

checked_locked_control.description: type=toggle Name of the child that will be displayed only in locked state

unchecked_locked_control.description: type=toggle Name of the child that will be displayed only in locked state

slider_direction.description: type=slider The orientation of the slider

slider_collection_name.description: type=slider Name of the collection the slider belongs to

background_control.description: type=slider Name of the object used as the slider background only in default state

background_hover_control.description: type=slider Name of the object used as the slide background only in hover state

progress_control.description: type=slider Name of the object used as the progress background only in default state

progress_hover_control.description: type=slider Name of the object used as the progress background only in hover state

slider_box_control.description: type=slider Name of the child that will be used as the scroll “thumb”/button

slider_select_on_hover.description: type=slider Focus slider when it’s hovered

text_edit_box_grid_collection_name.description: type=edit_box Name of the collection the `edit_box` belongs to

text_type.description: type=edit_box Type of characters that the user is allowed to type in th text field

max_length.description: type=edit_box Max number of characters allow in the text field

text_control.description: type=edit_box Name of the child that will be used for display the text

place_holder_control.description: type=edit_box Name of the child that will be used for display the placeholder text

scrollbar_track.description: type=scroll_view Name of the child to be used as the scrollbar track

scrollbar_box.description: type=scroll_view Name of the child to be used as the scrollbar “thumb”/button

scroll_content.description: type=scroll_view Name of the child that will have the scrolling panel content

scroll_view_port.description: type=scroll_view Name of the child to be used as the scrolling panel viewport

scroll_box_and_track_panel.description: type=scroll_view Name of the child that contains the scroll bar and track

renderer.description: type=custom Name of the hardcoded renderer

size.description: Width and height of the element [width, height].

max_size.description: Max width and height for the element

min_size.description: Min width and height the element can have

offset.description: How far in pixels or percentage from the position origin the element is (`[x_offset, y_offset]`).

clips_children.description: Hides everything inside that is outside of the width and height of the element

allow_clipping.description: Allows to `clips_children` to clip the element. if false `clips_children` won’t affect the element

layer.description: (positive or negative). the layer (like z|index in CSS) of the element relative to it’s parent and so on. An element with a greater layer will be in front of an element with a lower layer.

visible.description: If false, element takes place, but isn’t rendered (unlike ignored). It’s by default true so you don’t have to mention it every time you create a new element

ignored.description: Ignores element like if it isn’t there (unlike not visible)

enabled.description: If false it will disable all input elements inside of it.

alpha.description: From 0.0 to 1.0. Opacity of the image or text. If it’s defined in any other type it won’t affect any image/text child inside of it. For that you need to enable `propagate_alpha`

locked_alpha.description: same as `alpha`. It will be applied instead of `alpha` if the parent element is locked

propagate_alpha.description: Propagate the alpha property to any image or text child

anims.description: Name of the animations that will apply to the element

variables.description: Have conditions that change the variables values.

controls.description: To add children to the element

bindings.description: Bind and work with hardcoded values in the element

focus_change_up.description: Possible values: FOCUS_OVERRIDE_STOP or the focus_identifier of the object you want to focus when on button.menu_up

focus_change_down.description: Possible values: FOCUS_OVERRIDE_STOP or the focus_identifier of the object you want to focus when on button.menu_up

focus_change_left.description: Possible values: FOCUS_OVERRIDE_STOP or the focus_identifier of the object you want to focus when on button.menu_up

focus_change_right.description: Possible values: FOCUS_OVERRIDE_STOP or the focus_identifier of the object you want to focus when on button.menu_up

source_control_name.description: Name of the object to be evaluated

target_property_name.description: Property that its value will be override by the `source_property_name` value

binding_name_override.description: Property that its value will be override by the `binding_name` value

from_button_id.description: Button mappings can be applied to any kind of input elements (button, toggle, slider and input_panel) Button (action) id that fires

to_button_id.description: Button mappings can be applied to any kind of input elements (button, toggle, slider and input_panel) button (action) id that results

handle_select.description: Button mappings can be applied to any kind of input elements (button, toggle, slider and input_panel)

handle_deselect.description: Button mappings can be applied to any kind of input elements (button, toggle, slider and input_panel)

mapping_type.description: Button mappings can be applied to any kind of input elements (button, toggle, slider and input_panel)

scope.description: Button mappings can be applied to any kind of input elements (button, toggle, slider and input_panel)

input_mode_condition.description: Button mappings can be applied to any kind of input elements (button, toggle, slider and input_panel)

button_up_right_of_first_refusal.description: Button mappings can be applied to any kind of input elements (button, toggle, slider and input_panel)

duration.description: Number. Duration of the animation in seconds

from.description: Number (`anim_type` alpha) or a size/offset array (`anim_type` size/offset)

to.description: (`anim_type` alpha) or a size/offset array (`anim_type` size/offset)

destroy_at_end.description: Name of the object to destroy (stop rendering/ignored) when the animation ends. Doesn’t require namespace

next.description: Name of the animation that will play after this ends

play_event.description: Name of the event when the animation starts

end_event.description: Name of the event when the animation ends
